descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Robert Covington pokes the ball free on defense and gets it right back to knock down a 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Covington turns steal into 3-ball

videos.description: Jarrett Allen gets the ball in the paint and slams home an and-1 dunk over two Trail Blazer defenders.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jarrett Allen rises up for posterizing jam in traffic) 2021/11/3 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jarrett Allen rises up for posterizing jam in traffic

videos.description: Damian Lillard hits an off-balance shot with Darius Garland draped all over him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard sinks tough jumper with hand in his face) 2021/11/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard sinks tough jumper with hand in his face

videos.description: Anfernee Simons can't convert at the rim, but Cody Zeller flies in for a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cody Zeller cleans up with putback jam) 2021/11/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cody Zeller cleans up with putback jam

videos.description: Darius Garland sends a lob to Evan Mobley for an alley-oop jam.
videos.headline: Mobley throws down alley-oop

videos.description: CJ McCollum knocks down a shot from beyond the arc despite tough defense.
videos.headline: McCollum drills contested triple

videos.description: The Cavaliers close the third quarter in style as Darius Garland sinks a 3-pointer before the horn sounds.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Garland beats 3rd-quarter buzzer with shot from deep) 2021/11/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Garland beats 3rd-quarter buzzer with shot from deep

videos.description: Jarrett Allen maneuvers around multiple defenders down low to get a tough bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jarrett Allen goes to work in the post to score) 2021/11/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jarrett Allen goes to work in the post to score
